question:
Which of the following statements conform to the constitutional provisions made with respect to the Council of Ministers?
  1. An individual minister must enjoy confidence of President to hold the office
  2. The resignation of Prime Minister dissolves the council automatically
  3. A vote of no-confidence can be moved only against entire council and not individual ministers
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
All the statements are correct.
  • Council of Ministers holds the office during pleasure of President.
  • Since Prime Minister is the head of Council of Minister, his resignation or death will automatically dissolve the Lok Sabha.
  • Vote of No confidence is passed against entire council and not against individual ministers.
